Sentencas: With the growing footprint of solid oxide fuel cell stacks, there is a need to extend the operating range of compressible gaskets towards lower stress levels.
Titulo: Glass coated compressible solid oxide fuel cell seals

Sentencas: This article describes a method to manufacture SOFC seals by coating a compressible sealing material (Thermiculite 866) with glass to obtain good sealing performance even at compression stresses as low as 0.1 MPa.
Titulo: Glass coated compressible solid oxide fuel cell seals

Sentencas: Glass layer can be coated using an organic carrier consisting of terpineol, ethanol and ethyl cellulose.
Titulo: Glass coated compressible solid oxide fuel cell seals

Sentencas: The coated seals can be heat treated by simply ramping the temperature up to operating temperature at 60 Kh(-1) and therefore no extra steps, which are typical to glass seals, are required.
Titulo: Glass coated compressible solid oxide fuel cell seals

Sentencas: Coated seals were manufactured using this route and evaluated both ex-situ and in a real stack.
Titulo: Glass coated compressible solid oxide fuel cell seals

Sentencas: Leak rates of 0.1-0.3 ml (m min)(-1) were measured at 2-25 mbar overpressure using 50/50 H-2/N-2.
Titulo: Glass coated compressible solid oxide fuel cell seals

Sentencas: A 30-cell stack was manufactured and tested using coated seals.
Titulo: Glass coated compressible solid oxide fuel cell seals

Sentencas: At nominal operating conditions of 0.25 A cm(-2) and 650 degrees C average cathode temperature, 46% fuel utilization and 20% air utilization the stack had a total hydrogen cross leak of 60 ml min(-1) corresponding to 0.7% of the inlet hydrogen Row rate.
Titulo: Glass coated compressible solid oxide fuel cell seals
